translation: Good afternoon, everyone.
transcript: 大家下午好。

translation: I am Zhang Wuxiong from the Shanghai Institute of Microsystems, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
transcript: 我是来自中国科学院上海微系统所的张武雄。

translation: I will talk about how information technology represented by the Internet of Things can help engineering safety.
transcript: 那么我今天这个报告呢，给大家介绍一下我们通过以物联网为为代表的这种信息技术如何来助力这个工程的安全。

translation: I want to show it from several aspects.
transcript: 我想从几个方面来看。

translation: All of us hate the jerry-built project, but it is still inevitable at this stage.
transcript: 我们大家都很痛恨这个呃豆腐渣工程，但是呢豆腐渣工程在现在这个阶段还是不可避免的。

translation: We can recall that in 2007, the Jiujiang Bridge collapsed in an instant because of the impact of the ship.
transcript: 我们可以回顾一下，我们2007年，九江大桥当时因为有这个船舶的撞击，瞬间就垮塌了。

translation: This was also a very important event at that time.
transcript: 这也是当时非常重大的一个事件。

translation: There are also many jerry-built expressway.
transcript: 那么高速公路也是有很多的这个豆腐渣工程。

translation: We can look at the online assessment, which is the highway in Tianding, Gansu.
transcript: 我们可以看一下网上的一个评定，就是甘肃这个天定的这个高速公路，

translation: After opening to traffic in 2011, although its construction cost was as high as 100 million yuan per kilometer.
transcript: 2011年通车以后，很快，虽然它的建筑工造价高达一个亿每公里。

translation: The highway was cracked within a few days after its completion, and then it couldn't be used immediately and entered maintenance period.
transcript: 但是建成以后的几天之内这个高速公路就裂开，然后就马上就不能使用，进入一个维修期。

translation: There was also an incident in Shanghai.
transcript: 我们也可以看到上海的一个事件。

translation: At that time, there was a similar incident on the banks of the Lotus River.
transcript: 我们当时这个莲花河畔也是有类似的事件。

translation: Because of the extrusion of the soil, the building collapsed instantly.
transcript: 当时因为有土的一个挤压，楼房瞬间的倒塌。

translation: Of course, later, the price of this second-hand house is not too low.
transcript: 当然后面这个楼盘呢，它的造它的这个这个呃二手房的价格也并不太低。

translation: Because people later discovered that the glass and structure of this building was still very good.
transcript: 因为后来人家发现这个楼房的这个玻璃啊这些结构还是挺好的。

translation: Just its foundation was not done well, but it cannot be denied that there have been cheating on workmanship and materials.
transcript: 只是它的这个基础没做好，但是这也不能否认它当时也确实有一些偷工减料。

translation: In fact, from the perspective of Internet of Things.
transcript: 其实作为物联网来讲。

translation: It can start from the beginning of a building's construction, to its operation and maintenance to do the safety protection for it as a whole.
transcript: 它可以从这个一个建筑的源头刚开始建造到它的运行，并一直到它的维护，整体地这做一个对这个建筑进行安全进行一些防护。

translation: First let's see what is the Internet of Things.
transcript: 那么我们可以先看一下什么叫做物联网。

translation: The term "Internet of Things" was picked by Premier Wen Jiabao during his visit to the Wuxi sub-center of our laboratory in 2009.
transcript: 这个物联网这个词呢，是2009年温总理当时在我们实验室呃的无锡分中心去参观考察的时候我们给温总理提提供的这个架构图。

translation: We provided him with the architecture map.
transcript: 当时温总理就挑了物联网。

translation: Now we all know the word IoT.
transcript: 现在我们大家知道物联网这个词。

translation: Although the term Internet of Things may be unfamiliar to you, but we can have a look at it, there are many things in life that are already under the Internet of Things.
transcript: 那么虽然说物联网这个词呢可能跟大家生活上比较陌生，但是我们可以看一下，其实在生活上其实有很多东西已经是物联网了。

translation: We can look at the Mobike bicycles and OFO bicycles, which are good IoT applications.
transcript: 我们可以看一下像摩拜单车，O OFO的一些单车，这就是物联网的很好的一些应用。

translation: Nowadays, the best application of the IoT is smart driving or cars like this.
transcript: 现在物联网里面集大成的应用就是这种智能驾驶或者这种汽车。

translation: Each car has hundreds of different sensors in this network to monitor the quality and operating status of the car.
transcript: 每个汽车里面有几百个这种不同的传感器组成的这个网络来对车的质量进行监测，车的运行状态进行监测。

translation: The following is co-pole that Shanghai is now implementing.
transcript: 那么下面这个呢就是上海现在就在推行的这种共杆。

translation: It integrates utility poles and streetlights into a system.
transcript: 把电线杆把路灯杆等等就集成到一个系统里头。

translation: We can apply charging piles and WIFI to it, and then we can use it to do some of the environment monitoring.
transcript: 我们在下面可以给它做充电桩，那么可以给它做WIFI，然后可以在它基础上做一些这种环境监测。

translation: This is also a good application of the Internet of Things.
transcript: 这也是对呃物联网的一个很好的一种应用。

translation: We can review some of the early IoT applications, I will start from the right.
transcript: 那么我们可以回顾一下早期的几个物联网应用，我从右边开始讲。

translation: This is the cyanobacteria monitoring we did in Taihu Lake in 2009, when the water quality in the Taihu Lake Basin was very bad.
transcript: 这是2009年我们在太湖做的这个蓝藻监测，当时太湖的流域这个水质也是非常得不好。

translation: The security system of the World Expo next was also a large single IoT system at that time.
transcript: 那么后面世博的安防的系统呢，也是当时也是很大的一个单体的物联网系统。

translation: We can look at this on the left.
transcript: 我们可以看一下左边。

translation: This is the Internet of Things system we have done for Pudong Airport.
transcript: 这个呢是我们给浦东机场做的这个物联网的系统。

translation: It has been working normally since 2006, for more than ten years.
transcript: 从2006年到现在十几年还在正常地工作。

translation: And we have already caught more than a dozen people who are going to do some damage, but they haven't got the chance to.
transcript: 并且我们已经抓了十几个在里面进要进行破坏的人，但是他还没有进行破坏。

translation: The main reason is that we have this kind of Internet of Things system to carry out some early monitoring, to prevent and catch the destroyers in advance.
transcript: 主要原因就是我们有这种物联网的系统对它进行提早期的一些监测，能够提前防范并且逮到了这些破坏分子。

translation: Back to today's topic, how do we use the Internet of Things to help building safety?
transcript: 那么回到今天的这个主题，就是讲我们在呃物联网怎么来助力建筑的这个安全？

translation: Let us first look at the construction safety of the building.
transcript: 就是我们首先看一下建筑的施工的一个安全。

translation: What can the Internet of Things do?
transcript: 物联网能够做些什么工作？

translation: There are several important things in the construction of buildings.
transcript: 建筑施工里面我们有几个很重要的。

translation: First, how can we ensure that qualified people are doing what they can do reasonably.
transcript: 一是，建筑的人怎么能保证合适的就是有资质的人在做有在合理地做他能够做的一些事。

translation: On the other hand, we need to ensure that materials, processes, and safeguards are up to standard.
transcript: 另外一个方面我们要保证它的这个材料，包括它的工艺，包括它的这个保障措施是否达标。

translation: We can look at the first construction site here, there are some IoT systems in it, we can monitor the management staff in real time to see whether they are at work.
transcript: 我们来可以看一下就是这边的第一个，建筑工地里面有一些这种物联网系统，我们可以实时地监测管理人员是不是在岗。

translation: There is an electrician.
transcript: 他有，电工。

translation: Is he really an electrician who is operating some energized equipment?
transcript: 他是不是真的是电工在操作带电的一些设备？

translation: Does the one operating the tower crane has corresponding certificate?
transcript: 操作这个塔吊的是不是也有相应的证书？

translation: Correspondingly there are some systems that can do root-seeking, and some techniques that can be used for positioning.
transcript: 相应的有一些可以做寻根的一些系统啊，会做一些定位的一些技术。

translation: Then, whether the electricity is qualified for the building materials.
transcript: 那么电对于建筑材料是不是合格。

translation: We can also start from the moment the materials arrive at the site, test the, and put them in the designated position after the test.
transcript: 我们也可以从早期的每个材料进场，我会对它进行监测，检测完以后它放在指定的位置。

translation: When someone goes to move these building materials, the system can maintain a trace of the entire process from its inbound to outbound.
transcript: 有人再去搬这些建筑材料的时候，系统能够保持在从它的入库到出库到时领用的整个过程中的一个追溯。

translation: Just like we do food traceability.
transcript: 就像我们做食品溯源一样。

translation: The third is that we have to ensure that the construction process is up to standard.
transcript: 那么第三个呢，就是我们要保证这个施工的工艺是不是达标。

translation: We will have some means of IoT, sensor means, including some of our video surveillance methods to detect whether it is up to standard.
transcript: 我们会有呃一些物联网的手段，传感器的手段，包括我们有些视频监测的手段来探测是不是达标。

translation: In addition, we can look at whether the construction safety precautions are in place, whether our scaffolding is safe and reliable.
transcript: 另外呢，我们可以看一下就是施工的这个保障措施是不是到位，我们的脚手架是不是安稳定可靠。

translation: And we will also use some sensors to monitor its quality.
transcript: 这样话我们在上面也会做一些传感器来监测它的这个质量。

translation: So on this basis, we have made a whole set of solutions or systems based on the Internet of Things.
transcript: 那么在这个基础上，呃我们是做了一整套的这个基于物联网的这个解决方案或者是系统。

translation: We can see that there are all kinds of such sensors underneath.
transcript: 我们可以看到底下有各种各样的这种传感器。

translation: We can manage people and tower cranes, hooks and elevators.
transcript: 我们可以对人员进行管理，对这个塔吊进行管理，对这个钩机呀、包括升降机进行监进行管理。

translation: We also manage the environment, including the exhaust and drainage inside, videos, as well as the vehicle's access, including its weighing and some automatic detection.
transcript: 我们还对环境进行管理，包括里面的排气排水等等，包括视频，还有车辆的出出进出包括它的称重还有一些自动探测。

translation: With these sensors, we control all the conditions of the whole construction site through information.
transcript: 有了这些传感器以后我们把这个整个施工工地的所有的状况全部通过信息的手段进行掌控。

translation: After that, we built a variety of application systems to conduct security monitoring and analysis.
transcript: 掌控完以后我们构建了各种各样的这种应用的系统来对它进行安全监控和分析。

translation: Here are some examples.
transcript: 那么举几个例子。

translation: First of all, on the left, when we have some security incidents, I want to make sure that my staff, my equipment and my rescue measures are all in their positions.
transcript: 首先左边这一块呢，就是当我们如出现这个一些安全事故的时候，我要保证我的人员在哪里，我的设备在哪里，我的救援的措施在哪里。

translation: In this case, there is also a system that can be used to monitor.
transcript: 这样的话也有一套系统可以来进行监控。

translation: The safety of the tower crane is also a very important system.
transcript: 塔吊的安全呢也是一个呃一一个非常重要的系统。

translation: We have some sensors on the tower crane to detect whether it is tilted, whether it is swinging, etc.
transcript: 我们在这个塔吊上会有一些传感器来探测它是不是倾斜，是不是有摆动等等。

translation: So for environmental construction and monitoring, the current government requirements are very strict.
transcript: 那么对于环境施工和监测呢这是现在政府要求得非常的严的一块。

translation: We have to ensure that the water in the atmosphere is not polluted, so this is a very important part of the Internet of Things to solve construction safety.
transcript: 我们能保证大气里面的水是不是被污染了，所以这是物联网解决这个施工安全里面的一个很重要的一块。

translation: The glass curtain wall is a big problem we are considering.
transcript: 关于玻璃幕墙呢这个是我们在考虑的一个很大的问题。

translation: Our country has been building large-scale glass curtain walls since the 1980s.
transcript: 我们国家呢是从80年代开始就是开始大面积兴起这个玻璃幕墙。

translation: The high-rise buildings in our city are also very dense.
transcript: 我们城市的高楼也是非常的密集的。

translation: Our glass curtain wall has reached 85% of the world's total, a very high proportion.
transcript: 我们的整个玻璃幕墙的占有量达到了全球的85%，非常高的一个量。

translation: However, the glass curtain wall also has a problem.
transcript: 但是呢玻璃幕墙也有它的一个问题。

translation: Although the glass curtain wall has many advantages, it is more beautiful, and the construction is relatively simple.
transcript: 虽然玻璃幕墙有很多的优势，它比较美观啊，然后呢它的施工相对也比较简单。

translation: However, the life of the glass is only 15 years.
transcript: 那么但是玻璃的寿命其实只有15年。

translation: If it is used normally, the structural adhesive of the glass is only about ten years.
transcript: 正常使用的话，玻璃的结构胶，上面打的这层胶只有十年左右。

translation: So no matter Glass breakage or structural adhesive failure will have a great impact on it.
transcript: 所以不管是玻璃破碎还是这个结构胶失效都会对它造成很大的影响。

translation: As for the field of glass curtain wall monitoring.
transcript: 那么在玻璃幕墙监测这个领域呢。

translation: It is unfortunate that because the world's largest glass curtain wall use country is China, foreign research in this field is not so advanced.
transcript: 很遗憾，因为全球最大的玻璃幕墙使用国是中国，所以国外在这个领域里面其实它的研究并没有那么的先进。

translation: Therefore, at present, the most traditional detection may be that we take some of the detected devices there on our back and detect them one by one.
transcript: 所以呢，现在传统的检测呢可能最多我们有一些探测的设备背背过来一块一块玻璃地去探测。

translation: There are also some detection methods, that is, using this rubber hammer to knock and listen to the sound of the glass, so it is relatively primitive and backward.
transcript: 那么也有一些检测方法呢就是用这种橡皮锤去敲击，看这个玻璃的声音，所以呢比较的原始和落后。

translation: At the same time we have some building materials whose life, mainly glass.
transcript: 同时呢我们有一些建筑的材料它的寿命主要是指玻璃啊。

translation: Including structural glue and some structural parts inside, is relatively short, unlike our concrete structure.
transcript: 包括结构胶啊，包括里面的一些结构件，寿命还是相对比较短的，不像我们的比方混凝土结构。

translation: The third one is that the external atmospheric factors are also relatively large.
transcript: 第三个呢，就是外界的这个气因因素影响也比较大。

translation: The typhoon has a great influence on the bridge, and it is the same for the glass.
transcript: 台风对桥梁有很大的影响，但台风对玻璃也是一样的。

translation: It hits constantly.
transcript: 它不断地去冲击，对吧。

translation: At the same time, the glass is cleaned every year.
transcript: 同时呢我们的玻璃是每年都会有这种清洗。

translation: When the outer wall is rubbed, the tower crane hung the platform down.
transcript: 那么在外墙擦的时候，这个塔吊吊下来。

translation: When the wind blows, it will sway and hit the glass, which brings a lot of safety problems.
transcript: 然后有风吹的时候它摆动，它也会撞击到这个玻璃，所以带来很多的安全问题。

translation: In the past few years, the Shanghai Center also had a similar incident.
transcript: 呃，我们早期呢其实前几年上海中心也是有类似的事件。

translation: A piece of glass fell.
transcript: 玻璃整个掉下来以后。

translation: Luckily it hit a car, not a person.
transcript: 还好它是砸到了车，没有砸到人。

translation: Think of an egg that falls on dozens of floors could kill people, not to mention a glass.
transcript: 想想几十层楼掉下来一个鸡蛋都可以砸死人，更何况一个玻璃。

translation: Therefore, we use the technology and means of the Internet of Things to do a glass curtain wall safety monitoring system, which is cooperated with some schools such as Jiaotong University and Tongji.
transcript: 所以呢我们是用物联网的技术和手段呢来解来做了一套这个玻璃幕墙安全监测的一套系统，这是跟那个交大呀、跟同济啊等等一些学校一些合作。

translation: We have front-end sensors to detect vibration, stress, strain, including temperature and other parameters that affect glass safety.
transcript: 所以呢我们有前端的这个传感器，能够探测它的这个震动啊，应力、应变啊，包括温度啊等等影响玻璃的安全的一些参数。

translation: There are also some narrow-band IoT transmission technologies that make it easy to collect state data from the front-end glass.
transcript: 那么也有一些这个窄带物联网的一些传输的技术能够非常便捷地把前端玻璃的一些状态数据采集上来。

translation: After the data collection comes up, we can combine it with the big data and cloud computing tools in the platform.
transcript: 那么采集上来以后我们就可以通过这个平台里头会有一些大数据、云计算的一些手手段。

translation: Including the more fashionable artificial intelligence.
transcript: 包括跟现在比较时髦的人工智能也结合起来了。

translation: We conducted a large amount of data collection and analysis.
transcript: 我们进行了大量的这个数据采集和分析。

translation: And were able to provide early warning and establish a model in which the glass curtain wall would be broken.
transcript: 那么能够提前地预警，告诉建立这个玻璃的幕墙会破碎的一个模型。

translation: In this way, we can know the extent of this risk.
transcript: 这样的话呢，我们能够知道这个风险程度到底是多少。

translation: The second question is whether we could get to the glass curtain wall in the thunderstorm day?
transcript: 第二个问题就是我们到底雷雨天能不能到玻璃幕墙附近？

translation: In fact, according to our current safety standards, glass has certain safety, but with our system, I believe that in the future it will be much safer.
transcript: 其实呢，按照我们现在的安全标准，玻璃它相对还是有一定的安全性的，但是上了我们这套系统以后相信未来会更加得安全。

translation: So going back to the third question is how we can solve the security of the Internet of Things in the process of running.
transcript: 那么回到第三个问题，就是物联网我们怎么来解决就是在运行过程中的一些安全。

translation: The picture on the left is the Jinmao Building.
transcript: 左边这张图呢是我们的这个金贸大厦。

translation: When we think of the safety of this building, we may first think of high-rise buildings.
transcript: 我们一想到这个建筑的安全可能首先想到了高楼大厦。

translation: In fact, some places that are dangerous now are small and micro-locations, including group renting houses.
transcript: 其实呢现在很危险的一些地方就是这些小微场所，包括这种群租房。

translation: There are so many people living in the family workshops, and the hidden dangers of water and electricity and fire protection are also very large.
transcript: 家庭的一些作坊里头里面住的人也比较多，包括这种水啊、电哪这种消防隐患也是非常大的。

translation: Just like our current theater, if there is a fire next to it, maybe everyone has already withdrawn, but we don’t know if it’s a fire next door.
transcript: 就像我们现在这个剧场，如果旁边着火了，可能人家都已经撤了，但是我们这儿压根不知道隔壁到底是不是着火。

translation: It may have been very late when it burns over.
transcript: 等到烧过来的时候我们可能已经非常晚了。

translation: Are there any means and measures that can  solve the problems or give us some tips?
transcript: 到底有没有一些手段和措施能够解决或者说能够给我们提进行一些提示呢？

translation: There are.
transcript: 是有的。

translation: So we thought a lot of ways in the process of running, and we have done a lot of IoT systems for many different applications.
transcript: 所以呢我们呃在运行过程中我们呃提想了很多种方法，那么针对很多种不同的应用也做了很多种物联网的系统。

translation: This is an independent smoke sensor, which is popular at present.
transcript: 那么这个呢是现在也比较热的叫这个独立式的烟感。

translation: The traditional smoke sensor may be linked by the fire station, connecting with the sprinkler facility.
transcript: 传统的烟感呢可能是由消防局，包括跟喷淋设施是在联系在一起的。

translation: Any building must have this equipment if it is to be accepted.
transcript: 任何一个建筑，它如果要验收合格的话必须有这套设备。

translation: But now there are some independent smoke sensor, which can integrate some technologies into it, such as NB-IoT, LoRa and so on.
transcript: 但现在有些独立的烟感，那么我们可以在里面集成的这种包括现在比较热的叫窄带物联网NB-IoT，包括LoRa等等一些技术。

translation: Because of these narrow-band transmission technologies, for example, it can have a life of more than ten years, so after we put this in the room, we can integrate some voice broadcast information on it.
transcript: 它因为有这些窄带的传输技术，比方说它可以有十年以上的这个寿命，所以我们把这个布在房间里头以后，在上面可以集成一些这种语音广播的一些信息。

translation: If it is on fire next door, we may have this room informed at once.
transcript: 所以隔壁如果着火了可能瞬间我们这个房间里都知道了。

translation: With the support of the Shanghai Economic and Information Committee and the Science and Technology Commission.
transcript: 那么这个呢在上海经信委和科委的支持下。

translation: We have distributed nearly 30,000 independent smoke sensors in Yangpu and Hongkou and the Oriental Pearl.
transcript: 我们在这个杨浦和虹口由这个东方明珠，也是现在已经布了将呃将近3万多个这个独立式的烟感。

translation: In each family in the future, if you are interested, you can also buy this kind of equipment and install it at home.
transcript: 所以大家以后每个家庭里面，你们如果感兴趣的话，你们也可以去买这种设备就装在你家里。

translation: You can see whether your home has a fire or a hidden danger through the APP.
transcript: 你可以通过APP可以看到你家里的是不是有这种呃着火的情况或者隐患。

translation: The safety of the elevator is also a big problem.
transcript: 那么电梯的安全呢也是现在很大的一个问题。

translation: Shanghai is actually a place where elevators are very widely used.
transcript: 上海呢实际上是呃一个电电梯应用非常广的一个地方。

translation: We have 300,000 sets of elevators, and there may be thousands of elevators that have been in service for more than 15 years.
transcript: 我们将近有30万台的电梯的保有量，超期服役的呢15年以上的电梯可能有几千台。

translation: There are also 70,000-8,0000 units in 10 to 15 years, so this is also a huge amount.
transcript: 那么10到15年的呢也有七八万台，所以这也是很大的一个量。

translation: The actual service life of the elevator is generally only ten years according to requirements, so how to maintain it is also a big problem.
transcript: 电梯的实际的使用寿命按照要求来讲一般就是只有十年，所以怎么来做好这个维护也是很大的一个问题。

translation: Although we did not have so many accidents, the Internet of Things will certainly do a lot of work for the safety of elevators.
transcript: 虽然我们的事故没有出那么多，但是呢，物联网必然也能为这个电梯的安全做很多工作。

translation: So now we have a lot of sensors in the elevator, for floors, leveling, smoke sensor, main wire current and temperature, to judge whether the elevator is safe.
transcript: 所以呢现在我们在提在电梯里面加装很多的传感器，包括楼层，包括这个平层，包括这种烟感，包括我可以监刻控这个电梯的这个呃主要的这个电线的电流等等，包括它的温度，来判断这个电梯是不是安全。

translation: After doing this, we collect the elevator status data and can do a lot of artificial intelligence analysis remotely.
transcript: 那么做到这个以后，我们把电梯的很多状态数据采集上来，那么可以远程地做很多人工智能的分析。

translation: After that, we can rationally maintain the elevator.
transcript: 分析完以后我就其实可以做到一个事儿，就是电梯的这个合理化的维保。

translation: Now the normal maintenance of the elevator may be carried out with paper materials by people.
transcript: 现在的电梯正常的维保呢可能由人靠纸质的材料去进行进行维保。

translation: Did he go there?
transcript: 他是不是去了？

translation: How is the maintenance?
transcript: 维保的怎么样？

translation: No one knows.
transcript: 大家都不知道。

translation: But in the future, with this IoT system, we can guarantee the safety of each elevator for real.
transcript: 但未来有这套物联网的系统以后，我们可以切实地保障每台电梯它的安全性。

translation: This is actually not my profession.
transcript: 那么这个呢其实也不是我的专业。

translation: We have some fresh air in this building, including some systems for water supply and drainage.
transcript: 就是我们在这个大楼里面会有一些新风，包括一些供水的，包括一些给排水的一些系统。

translation: With some technical means of the Internet of Things.
transcript: 那么有的有了物联网的一些技术手段以后。

translation: We can check the wind at the outlet of the fresh air through the sensor, check the air quality, temperature and humidity in the room to adjust them to the most suitable level.
transcript: 我们可以通过传感器在比方说新风的出风口看一下这个风，看一下这个呃房间里的空气的质量，它的温度是什么，湿度是什么，那么调整最合适的温度和湿度。

translation: Then in the water supply and drainage, we can check whether the water volume, flow rate is appropriate, and then whether there is some pollution, etc..
transcript: 那么在给排水，我们可以看一下这个水量、流速是不是合适，然后里面是不是有些污染等等。

translation: In this way, we can guarantee the safety of the whole building.
transcript: 这样的话能保证大楼的这个安全。

translation: This is what our partner did on Guangzhou Tower.
transcript: 这是当时我们那个合作伙伴在那个广州小蛮腰上做的。

translation: Like the tall building of this kind, after we put some sensors on it, we can also check the swing and vibration of this tall building to judge whether it is in a safe state.
transcript: 像这种建筑的高楼，我们在上面有一布一些呃传感器以后，也可以看这个高楼的一些摆动，看看它的一些震动，那么也能判断它是不是处于一个安全的一个状态。

translation: This is what I think will be used in the high-rise buildings like the Shanghai Center in the future.
transcript: 所以呢这个也是我我认为这种东西以后也会在我们包括上海中心这样的高楼上面进行使用。

translation: Then another piece, this piece is my own work for seven or eight years.
transcript: 那么另外一块呢，这块呢是我本人七八年的一个工作。

translation: We did a security system for the middle line of the South-to-North Water Transfer Project.
transcript: 当时呢我们是给南水北调中线做的一这个这个安全防护的一套系统。

translation: The middle line is 1432 kilometers from the Danjiangkou Reservoir at the junction of Hubei and Henan to Beijing and Tianjin, with 1 billion cubic meters of water per year.
transcript: 那么中线呢是从当时就是湖北河南交界的丹江口水库引水1432公里到北京和天津，北京天津每年10亿立方米的水。

translation: But there were a lot of problems.
transcript: 但是这个里面就会有很多的问题。

translation: We can have a look at it, It will drill a tunnel every time it meets a mountain, and build a bridge evey time it comes across a valley.
transcript: 我们可以看一下它这个南水北调逢山就要钻隧洞，逢这个呃峡谷就要架桥。

translation: It was very complicated.
transcript: 所以它的工程也是非常复杂的。

translation: Then there are indeed a lot of safety problems inside.
transcript: 那么里面也确实有很多的安全问题。

translation: Like the aqueduct above, it is two kilometers long and full of water.
transcript: 像上面这种渡槽，两点几公里长上面全是水。

translation: The pressure of thousands of tons of water on the whole base is also very large.
transcript: 几千吨的水对整个这个基座的压力也是非常之大的。

translation: So we have a variety of sensors on it to monitor its displacement and seepage, and then build the engineering safety monitoring system accordingly.
transcript: 所以呢我们在上面有各种各样的传感器来监测它的位移沉降，渗流渗压，那么就相应地建构建了这个呃工程安全监测的一些系统。

translation: At the same time, we combine some weather information with the outside, no matter it is the information of the Meteorological Bureau or the information of the local rainfall station.
transcript: 同时呢我们跟外围的一些气象的一些信息，包括呃不管是这个气象局的一些信息还是当地的一些雨量站的信息相结合。

translation: At the same time, we also did monitoring the amount of water and water quality.
transcript: 那么同时呢我们还做了一些水量和水质的一些监测等等。

translation: Gather the information together to protect the entire project safety of the South-to-North Water Transfer Project.
transcript: 把这些信息汇聚上来，来对南水北调的整个工程的这个安全进行这个防护。

translation: We have also built a system to prevent human invasion.
transcript: 同时呢我们还构建了这个防防止人入侵的一套系统。

translation: If someone climbs the fence and enters the channel, I will know it and find him out in advance.
transcript: 就是说如果有人攀爬我这个围栏进入到我这个渠道，我就能知道我还能顺利地把他给呃呃提前找到，把他指出来。

translation: This will also improve the safety of the project.
transcript: 这样的话也能提升这工程的安全性。

translation: Here is an example.
transcript: 给大家举一个例子吧。

translation: Just like this kind of human invasion is also a big hidden danger.
transcript: 就像这种人的入侵也是里面一个很大的隐患。

translation: Because we digged the project artificiallys, it is very difficult for people who fall into this channel to get out.
transcript: 因为我们这个是人工挖的这个工程，所以人一旦掉到这个渠道里头是很难上来的。

translation: The slope is made of cement, which is very difficult to climb up.
transcript: 因为它这个是水泥的边坡，想爬上来都非常难。

translation: Therefore, human security is also a very core issue in the South-North Water Transfer Project.
transcript: 所以呢人的安全也是整个南水北调的里面的一个很核心的一个问题。

translation: I just talked about some technical means of various Internet of Things to solve or guarantee the safety of buildings.
transcript: 那么讲了前面的各种物联网的一些技术手段来解决这个或者来保证这个建筑的安全。

translation: Whether it is a bridge or a building, whether it is a highway or project of South-to-North Water Transfer.
transcript: 不管是这个桥梁啊，不管是这个大楼，不管是高速公路还是这个南水北调这样的工程。

translation: The new sensor of the future is indeed a very core technology, and maybe some implementation can be done in the future.
transcript: 那未来的新型传感器确实是里面的很核心的一块，说不定未来也是可以做一些实现。

translation: In our future intelligent buildings, it is necessary to informatize the entire process of building construction, including operation, renewal, and maintenance to the future.
transcript: 但是我们讲未来的智能建筑呢里面，它必然是把建筑的这个建造，包括运行、更新以及到未来的维护的整个过程要进行信息化。

translation: On the one hand, it enhances the safety level of this building, on the other hand, it also provides some convenience for people's lives.
transcript: 那么呢提一方面提升这个建筑的安全水平，另外一方面呢也是为人们的生活提供一些便利。

translation: But our country still has a lot of defects in the new sensor.
transcript: 但我可以看一下，我们国家其实在这个呃这新型的这个传感器方面还是有很多的缺陷的。

translation: We need a variety of new sensors on the one hand, but we can also see that especially in the high-end smart sensors.
transcript: 我们很一方面很需要各种新型的传感器，但是我们也可以看到在尤其是在这种高端的智能传感器方面。

translation: The United States, Japan and Germany are more advanced, accounting for about 70% of the world, and our country is only about 10%. .
transcript: 美国、日本和德国它们是比较先进的，占了全球大概70%，我们国家呢大概只有10%左右的。

translation: From a production point of view, there are more than 20,000 sensors in our country, and there are only about 10,000 in our country.
transcript: 那么同时从生产的角度，2万多种传感器我们国家大概只有1万多种。

translation: So this is also a big shortcoming for us, but where are the benefits?
transcript: 所以呢这个也是呃我们很大的一个短板，那么另外一块呢就是好处好事在哪里呢？

translation: It is the sensor industry in our country.
transcript: 就是我们国家呃的传感器产业呢。

translation: From the original counterfeiting, it has gradually begun to expand to the high end.
transcript: 由原来的仿造现在已开始逐步地开始往高端在拓展。

translation: Some chip factories in our country have begun to embark on the high-end route.
transcript: 呃我们国家的一些芯片厂已经开始在逐渐走上高端的一些路线。

translation: Here are some examples.
transcript: 给大家举几个简单的例子。

translation: Some of our high-speed accelerometers, including gyroscopes, used to be widely used in the military industry and are now turning to civilians.
transcript: 我们的一些高速度加速度器包括陀螺仪，以前在这个军工里头用得比较不错，现在也开始在转民用。

translation: Some of our pressure sensors are now also used in water meters and gas meters.
transcript: 然后我们一些压力传感器现在在这个水表、气表里头也也开始在应用。

translation: Some of our explosion-proof sensors, which we have already used when doing this security check at Pudong Airport.
transcript: 包括我们做的一些防爆的一些传感器，我们在包括包括浦东机场这样的做这个安检的时候已经在用。

translation: Some of our equipment with millimeter waves, including some of the security equipment, are already in use at the airport.
transcript: 我们有一些这个呃毫米波的一些设备，包括安检的一些设备已经在机场里这些设备里面在用了。

translation: So I believe that in the next three to five years, many of our high-end sensors can achieve breakthroughs.
transcript: 所以呢我相信就是在未来的3到5年之内，我们很多种高端的这个传感器是能够实现突破。

translation: With these sensors, we can provide more powerful technologies and means for building safety, especially for future assembled buildings, to protect its safety.
transcript: 那么有了这些传感器以后我们可以为建筑，尤其是未来的建筑在提这个装配式建筑以后，可以为它的这个安全提供更加有力的一些技术和手段，为它的安全保驾护航。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
